overview:
## Overview

[doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset] doesn’t support using its synchronous property accessors that can block the calling thread. Instead, use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to load [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsyncProperty] values asynchronously.

---
source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/AVFoundation/avasset-deprecated-symbols
crawled: 2025-12-04T11:03:16Z
---

# Deprecated symbols

**API Collection**

Review unsupported symbols and their replacements.

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsset] doesn’t support using its synchronous property accessors that can block the calling thread. Instead, use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to load [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsyncProperty] values asynchronously.

## Accessing duration and timing

- **duration**: A time value that indicates the asset’s duration.
- **providesPreciseDurationAndTiming**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset provides precise duration and timing.
- **minimumTimeOffsetFromLive**: A time value that indicates how closely playback follows the latest live stream content.

## Accessing tracks

- **tracks**: The tracks an asset contains.
- **track(withTrackID:)**: Returns a track that contains the specified identifier.
- **tracks(withMediaType:)**: Returns tracks that contain media of a specified type.
- **tracks(withMediaCharacteristic:)**: Returns an array of asset tracks matching the specified media characteristic.
- **unusedTrackID()**: Returns an identifier that no other tracks in the asset use.

## Accessing track groups

- **trackGroups**: The track groups an asset contains.

## Accessing metadata

- **metadata**: An array of metadata items for all metadata identifiers for which a value is available.
- **commonMetadata**: The metadata items an asset contains for common metadata identifiers that provide a value.
- **availableMetadataFormats**: The metadata formats this asset contains.
- **metadata(forFormat:)**: Returns an array of metadata items from the container with the specified format.
- **creationDate**: A metadata item that indicates the asset’s creation date.
- **lyrics**: The lyrics of the asset in a language suitable for the current locale.

## Accessing suitability

- **isPlayable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset has playable content.
- **isExportable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can export this asset using an export session.
- **isReadable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can extract the asset’s media data using an asset reader.
- **isComposable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can use the asset as a segment of a composition track.
- **isCompatibleWithAirPlayVideo**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is compatible with AirPlay Video.
- **isCompatibleWithSavedPhotosAlbum**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can write the asset to the Saved Photos album.

## Accessing asset preferences

- **preferredRate**: The asset’s rate preference for playing its media.
- **preferredVolume**: The asset’s volume preference for playing its audible media.
- **preferredTransform**: The asset’s transform preference to apply to its visual content during presentation or processing.
- **preferredDisplayCriteria**: The asset’s display mode preference for optimal playback of its content.
- **preferredMediaSelection**: The default media selections for this asset’s media selection groups.

## Accessing media selections

- **allMediaSelections**: The array of available media selections for this asset.
- **availableMediaCharacteristicsWithMediaSelectionOptions**: An array of media characteristics for which a media selection option is available.
- **mediaSelectionGroup(forMediaCharacteristic:)**: Returns a media selection group that contains one or more options with the specified media characteristic.

## Accessing chapter metadata

- **availableChapterLocales**: The locales of the asset’s chapter metadata.
- **chapterMetadataGroups(withTitleLocale:containingItemsWithCommonKeys:)**: Returns an array of chapters that contain the specified title locale and common keys.
- **chapterMetadataGroups(bestMatchingPreferredLanguages:)**: Returns an array of chapters with a locale that best matches the list of preferred languages.

## Accessing content protections

- **hasProtectedContent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset contains protected content.

## Accessing fragment support

- **canContainFragments**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can extend the asset by fragments.
- **containsFragments**: A Boolean value that indicates whether at least one movie fragment extends the asset.
- **overallDurationHint**: The total duration of fragments that currently exist, or may exist in the future.

## Inspecting visual attributes

- **naturalSize**: The encoded or authored size of the visual portion of the asset.
